########## JAPANESE INTRO-02 TEXT ###########
1712E2-171782

1185 (3+1182)

Header 20 06 06


あれから...
1年の月日が流れた

Since then...
One year has passed

平和の訪れたドカポン王国に

ふたたび...

Since then...
One year has passed

In Dokapon where peace has come

Again ...

Not compressed
